summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the account associated with The Haze Trust. It outlines the beginning and ending balances, deposits, withdrawals, and service charges for the month of May 2017.

persons.name: Cynthia Rockraut
persons.context: Cynthia Rockraut is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3 St, Thomas 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account associated with The Haze Trust had a beginning balance of $21,021,993.06 as of May 1, 2017.
The ending balance as of May 31, 2017, was $21,036,276.90.
There was a funds transfer of $1,000.00 on May 5, 2017.
An interest payment of $14,282.84 was credited to the account on May 31, 2017.
The document includes details about service charges and fees, including NSF return item fees and overdraft fees.
